ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ValueRange: American Indian/Alaska Native; Asian; Hawaiian or Pacific Islander; Black or African American; White; More than one race; Unknown or not reported; Other Non-White; Other

ElementDescription: If I believed I was having a mental breakdown, my first inclination would be to get professional attention.
Notes: 0= Disagree; 1= Partly Disagree; 2= Partly agree; 3= Agree

ElementDescription: The idea of talking about problems with a psychologist strikes me as a poor way to get rid of emotional conflicts
Notes: 0= Agree; 1= Partly Agree; 2= Partly Disagree; 3= Disagree

ElementDescription: If I were experiencing a serious emotional crisis at this point in my life, I would be confident that I could find relief in psychotherapy
Notes: 0= Disagree; 1= Partly Disagree; 2= Partly agree; 3= Agree

ElementDescription: There is something admirable in the attitude of a person who is willing to cope with his or her conflicts and fears without resorting to professional help
Notes: 0= Agree; 1= Partly Agree; 2= Partly Disagree; 3= Disagree

ElementDescription: I would want to get psychological help if I were worried or upset for a long period of time.
Notes: 0= Disagree; 1= Partly Disagree; 2= Partly agree; 3= Agree

ElementDescription: I might want to have psychological counseling in the future.
Notes: 0= Disagree; 1= Partly Disagree; 2= Partly agree; 3= Agree

ElementDescription: A person with an emotional problem is not likely to solve it alone; he or she is likely to solve it with professional help.
Notes: 0= Disagree; 1= Partly Disagree; 2= Partly agree; 3= Agree

ElementDescription: Considering the time and expense involved in psychotherapy, it would have doubtful value for a person like me.
Notes: 0= Agree; 1= Partly Agree; 2= Partly Disagree; 3= Disagree

ElementDescription: A person should work out his or her own problems; getting psychological counseling would be a last resort.
Notes: 0= Agree; 1= Partly Agree; 2= Partly Disagree; 3= Disagree

ElementDescription: Personal and emotional troubles, like many things, tend to work out by themselves.
Notes: 0= Agree; 1= Partly Agree; 2= Partly Disagree; 3= Disagree
